Class GameSpecificRanGen

  • java.lang.Object
    • logica_jogo.RandomGenerator
      • logica_jogo.GameSpecificRanGen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameSpecificRanGen
extends RandomGenerator
implements java.io.Serializable
    A random number generator able to operate in a random or non-random way By default behaves as a random generator
    See Also:

        randomModeOn in class RandomGenerator

      • randomModeOff

        public void randomModeOff(int[] sleep,
                 int[] wake,
                 int[] move)
        A method to turn random mode off.
        Parameters:
        sleep - An array of values that will be used to determine if the dragon should sleep. (0 to set to Sleep, other value otherwise). After the end of the array is reached the first element is returned in an endless loop.
        wake - An array of values that will be used to determine if the dragon should wake. (0 to set to wake, other value otherwise). After the end of the array is reached the first element is returned in an endless loop.
        move - An array of values that will be used to determine if the dragon should sleep. After the end of the array is reached the first element is returned in an endless loop.
